text: Julio Peredejordi (born 1906, date of death unknown) was a Spanish swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Spanish male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Spain Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Julio Peredejordi
